purchase 17 self-contained breathing apparatuses, U.S. Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand announced today. The new breathing apparatuses will replace the fire company's 13-year-old air packs, and increase the overall safety of Mottville's 35 volunteer firefighters. It's going to help keep all the firefighters safe so they can enter burning buildings with the latest technology in air packs, Mottville volunteer Fire Chief Tim Baker said. archaeological monuments. Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection was secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside was posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still-smoldering NDP headquarters. in diesem Jahr mehr als 1000 neue Stellen in Europa schaffen, sagte scheidende Vorstandschef Eric Schmidt sagte am Dienstag in M?nchen. Allein in M?nchen sollen mehrere hundert Stellen im Forschungs- und Entwicklungszentrum in M?nchen entstehen. Wir hatten ein sehr, sehr gutes Jahr , sagte Eric Schmidt zum Abschluss der Internet-Konferenz DLD( Digital, Life, Design). "Aus diesen Gr?nden werden wir weiter investieren."
